org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions

类 ProcessFunction.Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.ProcessFunction.Context

    KeyedProcessOperator.ContextImpl, ProcessFunction.OnTimerContext, ProcessOperator.ContextImpl
    封闭类:
    ProcessFunction<I,O>

    public abstract class ProcessFunction.Context
extends java.lang.Object
    Information available in an invocation of ProcessFunction.processElement(Object, Context, Collector) or ProcessFunction.onTimer(long, OnTimerContext, Collector).

    • 方法详细资料

      • timestamp

        public abstract java.lang.Long timestamp()
        Timestamp of the element currently being processed or timestamp of a firing timer.

        This might be null, for example if the time characteristic of your program is set to TimeCharacteristic.ProcessingTime.

      • timerService

        public abstract TimerService timerService()
        A TimerService for querying time and registering timers.

      • output

        public abstract <X> void output(OutputTag<X> outputTag,
                                X value)
        Emits a record to the side output identified by the OutputTag.
        参数:
        outputTag - the OutputTag that identifies the side output to emit to.
        value - The record to emit.
